thread.title: Jeremy McConnell is arrested on suspicion of assaulting mother of his child Stephanie Davis
thread.title_full: Jeremy McConnell is arrested on suspicion of assaulting mother of his child Stephanie Davis

author: Emmeline Saunders
title: Jeremy McConnell is arrested on suspicion of assaulting mother of his child Stephanie Davis
text:
Jeremy McConnell is arrested on suspicion of assaulting mother of his child Stephanie Davis The ex of Stephanie Davis has been held by police Share     
Jeremy McConnell has been arrested on suspicion of assault, Merseyside Police confirmed today. 
The Irish model was held by officers are flying back to Liverpool from Ireland to help them with their investigation into an alleged assault on Stephanie Davis . 
A spokesperson for the force said in a statement: "Following a report of an assault at an address in Stephenson Grove, Rainhill, a man has this morning (Thursday, 16 March) been arrested. "A 27-year-old man from Liverpool city centre has been arrested on suspicion of assault and criminal damage after voluntarily attending a police station on Merseyside. He remains in police custody for questioning." Jeremy McConnell spoke to police about the allegation (Photo: Rex Features) 
The incident is said to have happened on Thursday 9th March and was reported to police on Sunday 12 March. 
A police spokesperson previously told Mirror Online: "Merseyside Police can confirm a report was received of an assault at a property on Thursday 9 March. 
"Officers were contacted on Sunday 12 March and an investigation into the incident is on-going." Steph was said to have reported the incident on Sunday (Photo: The Showbiz Show Presented by Simon Gross) 
Previously, a rep for Jeremy had told Mirror Online: "Jeremy denies any wrongdoing, however he is fully cooperating with the police in their investigations." 
Stephanie has not yet spoken publicly about the incident. Like us on Facebook
